EmailTemplate.name: Plan : Expiration Notification Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Action Required : Turf {!Plan__c.Name} - Nearing Expiration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Plan__c.User__c},
A turf that has been assigned to you is approaching expiration. Please take the necessary action.
Turf Details:
Turf Name : {!Plan__c.Name} Expiration Date : {!Plan__c.Expiration_Date__c}
Best Regards, Comcast
